DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess benefit use online , tailor behavioral weight management material ( Balance ) , combination nutritional material ( Balance Nourish ) , conjunction goal set tool ( Balance Achieve ) , combination three ( Balance , Nourish Achieve ) . This objective evaluate measure weight loss rate report study participant 3 , 12 , 18 month post-enrollment . The hypothesis add additional material increase effect intervention use Balance alone .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Web-based Tailored Weight Management Program
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control , web-based trial weight management four treatment arm . Participants assign receive tailor material either : 1 ) Balance program , 2 ) Balance Nourish program , 3 ) Balance Achieve program , 4 ) Balance , Nourish Achieve program . Participants recruit directly health care organization . In order participate , participant must visit website confirm eligibility , e.g . valid e-mail address . Those wish participate provide consent Web , present online questionnaire . These question provide baseline data participant basis tailor Balance material participant receive . Within 24 hour submit complete questionnaire , participant inform e-mail tailored Balance plan available website . They receive follow-up material e-mail six-week period enroll . Participants assign additional program send e-mails link relevant program . At 3 , 12 18 month , participant assess via online survey . The assessment include weight management parameter , psychosocial outcome , program utilization . This data self-reported . STUDY POPULATION The study sample drawn member three integrated delivery system : Kaiser Permanente Colorado ( KPCO ) , Kaiser Permanente Ohio ( KPOH ) , Group Health Cooperative ( GHC ) Puget Sound . In order participate , participant must access enroll study Web . A total 1,848 participant enrol within six-month period , approximately 450 participant treatment arm . By 18-month follow-up , assume successful data collection least 65 percent enrollee , 1200 participant , 300 treatment group . The study open meet inclusion exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 1875 year age 2 . Current KP GHC member 3 . BMI great equal 30 BMI great equal 25 one follow chronic illness : diabetes , coronary artery disease , depression , asthma , arthritis . 4 . Agree contact via computerized questionnaire 3 , 12 18 month postenrollment 5 . Regular access Internet function email address 1 . Current use pharmacologic , behavioral surgical treatment weight loss 2 . Currently pregnant planning pregnancy 3 . Inability read English . 4 . Presence Congestive Heart Failure 5 . KP Ohio region member participate original THeME study
